speaker: SOLANIO
text: Now, what news on the Rialto?

speaker: SALARINO
text: Why, yet it lives there unchecked that Antonio

speaker: SALARINO
text: hath a ship of rich lading wracked on the

speaker: SALARINO
text: Narrow Seas—the Goodwins, I think they call the

speaker: SALARINO
text: place—a very dangerous flat, and fatal, where the

speaker: SALARINO
text: carcasses of many a tall ship lie buried, as they say,

speaker: SALARINO
text: if my gossip Report be an honest woman of her

speaker: SALARINO
text: word.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: I would she were as lying a gossip in that as

speaker: SOLANIO
text: ever knapped ginger or made her neighbors believe

speaker: SOLANIO
text: she wept for the death of a third husband. But

speaker: SOLANIO
text: it is true, without any slips of prolixity or crossing

speaker: SOLANIO
text: the plain highway of talk, that the good Antonio,

speaker: SOLANIO
text: the honest Antonio—O, that I had a title good

speaker: SOLANIO
text: enough to keep his name company!—

speaker: SALARINO
text: Come, the full stop.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: Ha, what sayest thou? Why, the end is, he

speaker: SOLANIO
text: hath lost a ship.

speaker: SALARINO
text: I would it might prove the end of his losses.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: Let me say “amen” betimes, lest the devil

speaker: SOLANIO
text: cross my prayer, for here he comes in the likeness

speaker: SOLANIO
text: of a Jew.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: How now, Shylock, what news among the

speaker: SOLANIO
text: merchants?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: You knew, none so well, none so well as you,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: of my daughter’s flight.

speaker: SALARINO
text: That’s certain. I for my part knew the tailor

speaker: SALARINO
text: that made the wings she flew withal.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: And Shylock for his own part knew the bird

speaker: SOLANIO
text: was fledge, and then it is the complexion of them

speaker: SOLANIO
text: all to leave the dam.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: She is damned for it.

speaker: SALARINO
text: That’s certain, if the devil may be her judge.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: My own flesh and blood to rebel!

speaker: SOLANIO
text: Out upon it, old carrion! Rebels it at these

speaker: SOLANIO
text: years?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: I say my daughter is my flesh and my blood.

speaker: SALARINO
text: There is more difference between thy flesh

speaker: SALARINO
text: and hers than between jet and ivory, more between

speaker: SALARINO
text: your bloods than there is between red wine and

speaker: SALARINO
text: Rhenish. But tell us, do you hear whether Antonio

speaker: SALARINO
text: have had any loss at sea or no?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: There I have another bad match! A bankrout,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: a prodigal, who dare scarce show his head on

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: the Rialto, a beggar that was used to come so smug

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: upon the mart! Let him look to his bond. He was

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: wont to call me usurer; let him look to his bond. He

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: was wont to lend money for a Christian cur’sy; let

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: him look to his bond.

speaker: SALARINO
text: Why, I am sure if he forfeit, thou wilt not

speaker: SALARINO
text: take his flesh! What’s that good for?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: To bait fish withal; if it will feed nothing else,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: it will feed my revenge. He hath disgraced me and

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: hindered me half a million, laughed at my losses,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: mocked at my gains, scorned my nation, thwarted

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: my bargains, cooled my friends, heated mine enemies—

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: and what’s his reason? I am a Jew. Hath not

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: a Jew eyes? Hath not a Jew hands, organs, dimensions,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: senses, affections, passions? Fed with the

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: same food, hurt with the same weapons, subject to

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: the same diseases, healed by the same means,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: warmed and cooled by the same winter and summer

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: as a Christian is? If you prick us, do we not

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: bleed? If you tickle us, do we not laugh? If you

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: poison us, do we not die? And if you wrong us, shall

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: we not revenge? If we are like you in the rest, we will

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: resemble you in that. If a Jew wrong a Christian,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: what is his humility? Revenge. If a Christian wrong

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: a Jew, what should his sufferance be by Christian

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: example? Why, revenge! The villainy you teach me I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: will execute, and it shall go hard but I will better the

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: instruction.

speaker: SERVINGMAN
text: Gentlemen, my master Antonio is at his

speaker: SERVINGMAN
text: house and desires to speak with you both.

speaker: SALARINO
text: We have been up and down to seek him.

speaker: SOLANIO
text: Here comes another of the tribe; a third

speaker: SOLANIO
text: cannot be matched unless the devil himself turn

speaker: SOLANIO
text: Jew.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: How now, Tubal, what news from Genoa?

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Hast thou found my daughter?

speaker: TUBAL
text: I often came where I did hear of her, but

speaker: TUBAL
text: cannot find her.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Why, there, there, there, there! A diamond

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: gone cost me two thousand ducats in Frankfurt!

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: The curse never fell upon our nation till now, I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: never felt it till now. Two thousand ducats in that,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: and other precious, precious jewels! I would my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: daughter were dead at my foot and the jewels in her

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: ear; would she were hearsed at my foot and the

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: ducats in her coffin. No news of them? Why so? And

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: I know not what’s spent in the search! Why, thou

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: loss upon loss! The thief gone with so much, and so

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: much to find the thief, and no satisfaction, no

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: revenge, nor no ill luck stirring but what lights a’ my

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: shoulders, no sighs but a’ my breathing, no tears but

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: a’ my shedding.

speaker: TUBAL
text: Yes, other men have ill luck, too. Antonio, as I

speaker: TUBAL
text: heard in Genoa—

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: What, what, what? Ill luck, ill luck?

speaker: TUBAL
text: —hath an argosy cast away coming from

speaker: TUBAL
text: Tripolis.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: I thank God, I thank God! Is it true, is it true?

speaker: TUBAL
text: I spoke with some of the sailors that escaped

speaker: TUBAL
text: the wrack.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: I thank thee, good Tubal. Good news, good

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: news! Ha, ha, heard in Genoa—

speaker: TUBAL
text: Your daughter spent in Genoa, as I heard, one

speaker: TUBAL
text: night fourscore ducats.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Thou stick’st a dagger in me. I shall never

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: see my gold again. Fourscore ducats at a sitting,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: fourscore ducats!

speaker: TUBAL
text: There came divers of Antonio’s creditors in my

speaker: TUBAL
text: company to Venice that swear he cannot choose

speaker: TUBAL
text: but break.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: I am very glad of it. I’ll plague him, I’ll

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: torture him. I am glad of it.

speaker: TUBAL
text: One of them showed me a ring that he had of

speaker: TUBAL
text: your daughter for a monkey.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Out upon her! Thou torturest me, Tubal. It

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: was my turquoise! I had it of Leah when I was a

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: bachelor. I would not have given it for a wilderness

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: of monkeys.

speaker: TUBAL
text: But Antonio is certainly undone.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Nay, that’s true, that’s very true. Go, Tubal,

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: fee me an officer. Bespeak him a fortnight before. I

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: will have the heart of him if he forfeit, for were he

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: out of Venice I can make what merchandise I will.

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Go, Tubal, and meet me at our synagogue. Go, good

speaker: SHYLOCK
text: Tubal, at our synagogue, Tubal.
